name: Blood Oath: When The Sword Rises
name_original: Blood Oath: When The Sword Rises
description:
The game offers extensive customization of your character in both modes Freemode and ArcadeMode, allowing you to choose from dozens of weapons, including swords, maces, shields and bows; different outfits and choose your own attack animations. All this will affect you both aesthetically and in your way of fighting.

Freemode will allow the players to build their own story in a vast world, where they can join guilds and player-lead factions, exploring the provinces while using a free building construction system, weapon creation, diplomacy and much more.

Arcade mode currently has FIVE game modes:
· Team Deathmatch 2 to 4 Teams
· Free For All
· Capture the Flag
· Last Team Standing 2 to 4 Teams
· Defense

This modes can be played on four maps of different sizes, which will allow larger battles on larger maps.
